body:
Hey all!

If you haven't noticed, we've been quite short on Senior Moderators lately. Over the last few weeks, we have discussed candidates for Senior Moderator, and have recently conducted interviews for the position. Although every Moderator who had an interview showed amazing potential, we have decided to only promote three Moderators. Congratulations to Zeusy, Fouled, & Theoretical on their promotions to Senior Moderator! 

Regards,
The Senior Staff Team
body_tagged:
Hey all!

If you haven't noticed, we've been quite short on Senior Moderators lately. Over the last few weeks, we have discussed candidates for Senior Moderator, and have recently conducted interviews for the position. Although every Moderator who had an interview showed amazing potential, we have decided to only promote three Moderators. Congratulations to Zeusy, Fouled, & Theoretical on their promotions to Senior Moderator! 

Regards,
The Senior Staff Team
title: New Senior Moderators!

replies.body:
THEO BABE CONGRATS 

u2 Zeusy and Fouled :P

A question by the way. Why were they promoted? Zeusy and Theoretical have been promoted recently to moderator. I know Fouled has been a mod for longer though. Is it because they were staff members before so they are being offered a higher position now?
replies.body_tagged:
THEO BABE CONGRATS 

u2 Zeusy and Fouled :P

A question by the way. Why were they promoted? Zeusy and Theoretical have been promoted recently to moderator. I know Fouled has been a mod for longer though. Is it because they were staff members before so they are being offered a higher position now?

replies.body: Prior experience counted towards promotion to senior moderator.
replies.body_tagged: Prior experience counted towards promotion to senior moderator.

replies.body:
The amount of words you write won'treally affect your chances. 

Quality over quantity. Be specific, detailed, and professional about it. If you don't explain your answer, it can affect you.
replies.body_tagged:
The amount of words you write won'treally affect your chances. 

Quality over quantity. Be specific, detailed, and professional about it. If you don't explain your answer, it can affect you.
